existing_features.title: Make the Log page empty-state primary action actually help the user add their first entry by navigating to the Dashboard and automatically opening the Add Entry dialog.
Improve the Dashboardâ€™s readability by adding a clear visual indicator of daily limit usage (e.g., a progress bar or meter) and ensuring the over-limit state is visually distinct and accessible.

Clean up footer social icons so they are not dead links: replace placeholder href="#" links with a non-clickable/disabled presentation or remove them, while keeping the footer layout visually balanced.

new_feature_requests.summary: Improve the app a little bit (general enhancements/updates requested by user)

projectName: Polish UX: better empty-state actions, dashboard progress indicator, and footer link cleanup
